EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-08-17-Minneapolis-CAE-Commercial-Send-2.Email-Invite-Marketing-Commercia
EmailTemplate.subject: Next Week: Twins vs. Indians on August 17th
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/community-appreciation-minnesota-twins/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are pleased to invite to you an exclusive event on August 17th, as the Minnesota Twins take on the Cleveland Indians.
We are expecting a fantastic summer afternoon filled with food, drinks, and of course, baseball. We hope you will accept this invitation to join us, learn more about Turbonomic, and network with your peers in the technology industry.
Minneapolis Community Appreciation - Twins vs. Indians <[[https://turbonomic.com/community-appreciation-minnesota-twins/]]> Where: Target Field 1 Twins Way, Minneapolis, MN 55403 Thursday, August 17th 12:10pm
RSVP by August 10th! <[[https://turbonomic.com/community-appreciation-minnesota-twins/]]>
We hope to see you there,
- the Turbonomic Team
